resources.string: Write It Say It Hear It

Create a new cue to add to the community cue pool! 

 Cues are meant to get the brain juices flowing! They offer a starting point for writers. 

 They should be short and concise!

Create a new story to add to the community! 

 Stories shouldn't be too long. Try to keep them short and focused. The idea is to practice a little everyday! 

 Stories will be available to be narrated by the community!
Cues must be between %1$d and %2$d characters.
Stories must be between %1$d and %2$d characters.
Comments must be at least %1$d characters.
